On Sun, 26 Mar 2000, Lyrnia Jongleur wrote:
>
> In early beta, the Bard sang his/her song to everyone around them.
>
> As has been mentioned before: This is not true. This occured in late/mid
> Beta 3 and lasted for about 3 weeks. It was a bug and it took them a while
> to figure out what they broke when they modified our songs. This was also

If a simple bug caused this, then despite the exact order it
happened in, the point of the original poster still stands.
It sounds like our songs are actually implemented to affect
everyone/everything in an area of effect, and checks are in
place to disregard the song if you're not in the bard's group
(or vice versa if an offensive song).
